Raymond Balinsky

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Bylinski, Bylinska, Byluska
  2. Foster Name: Lester
  3. Foster Family: Henry and Rebecca Thomas
  4. Location of Family: Grand Island, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Aurora, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 2
  8. Date of Birth: 1915, NY
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Children's Aid Society Annual Report 1923, p. 89; 1920 United States Federal Census; Hamilton County Register, 15 June 1917; 22 June 1917; Archives Database; 1930 census, Hall Co., NE
